Class: sofa.tracking.GoogleAnalyticsTracker

Defined in:
sofa-tracking/src/sofa.tracking.googleAnalyticsTracker.js:8
Dependencies:
None
Package:
sofa-tracking
Package dependencies:
sofa-core, sofa-http-service

Installation

  1. Getting the source

    You can access this class by installing the sofa-tracking package. Installing this package is as easy as running one of the following commands:

    • Via npm:

      npm install sofa-tracking

    • Via Bower:

      bower install sofa-tracking

    • Via Git:

      git clone http://github.com/sofa/sofa-tracking

  2. Embedding the source

    After that, embed the distribution file in your HTML document.

    <script src="dist/sofa.tracking.js"></script>

    Don't forget that each package defines its own package dependencies. Make sure to embed their files too if needed.

  3. Use it!

    After that, create an instance of this service by using the `new` operator:

    var googleAnalyticsTracker = new sofa.tracking.GoogleAnalyticsTracker();

Description

A Google Analytics Tracker abstraction layer to connect to the SDK's tracker interface.

Methods

  • setup()

    Defined in sofa-tracking/src/sofa.tracking.googleAnalyticsTracker.js:27

    Sets up Google Analytics tracking code snippet with provided client information like account number and domain name.

  • trackEvent(eventData)

    Defined in sofa-tracking/src/sofa.tracking.googleAnalyticsTracker.js:51

    Explicit event tracking. This method pushes tracking data to Google Analytics.

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    eventData object

    Event data object.

  • trackTransaction(transactionData)

    Defined in sofa-tracking/src/sofa.tracking.googleAnalyticsTracker.js:90

    Pushes transaction data using the Google Analytics Ecommerce Tracking API

    Param Type Details
